zh: 好的爱情使你通过一个人看到整个世界，坏的爱情使你为了一个人舍弃整个世界。
en: Good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person.

zh: 如果你真要梦想成真，就先从梦中醒来。
en: If you really want to dream come true, first woke up from a dream.

zh: 你如果还相信她爱你，你就是在欺骗自己。
en: You are deceiving yourself if you still believe that she loves you.

zh: 人生最糟的不是失去爱的人，而是因为太爱一个人而失去了自己
en: worst thing in life is not losing the one we love, but losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much.

zh: 人生就是这样的往往你觉得重要的到最后都变成最不重要了。珍惜才是拥有一切的开始
en: Life usually goes in this ways. To you the once most important thing will finally become nothing. To treasure what you have is actually the beginning to own everything.

zh: 那么华丽的外表，却只是你虚伪的掩饰
en: So gorgeous appearance, but only you false hide.

zh: 有时候，一个人选择离开不是因为自私，而是他心里清楚如果留下来，事情会变得更糟。
en: people choose to leave not because of selfish reasons but they just know that things will get worse if they stay.

zh: 去爱一个拥有和给你正面能量的人
en: To love one who has and gives you positive energy.

zh: 如果你选择一条保守的线路，就只能实现一个狭窄的目标
en: If you choose a conservative line, can achieve the goal of a narrow

zh: 有很多人会叫你的名字，但只有一个人让你的名字听起来那么特别。来自
en: are a lot of people who call you by your name, but only one who makes it sound special.

zh: 你唯一应该努力超越的人，就是昨天的自己
en: YesThe only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday

zh: 生活中最神奇的事往往发生在你准备放弃希望的那一刻
en: The most amazing things in life tend to happen right at the moment you are about to give up hope.

zh: 当你停止追逐错误的事物，就给了那些正确的事物一个机会，让他们抓住你
en: When you stop chasing the wrong things it means that you give the right things chance to catch you.

zh: 生活的主题就是，面对复杂，保持欢喜。
en: The theme of life is to remain joyful in the face of complexity.

zh: 在你的梦想变成现实之前，永不放弃。早
en: Never give up on your dreams before they become a reality.

zh: 不要失去希望，你永远不知道明天会带来什么。
en: lose hope. You never know what tomorrow will bring

zh: 我从不喜欢让别人看见我的眼泪，我宁可让别人觉得我快乐得没心没肺，也不愿意让自己看起来委屈可怜。
en: I never like to let others see my tears, I would rather let people think I am happy too heartless, but also do not want to seem poor wronged.

zh: 当你不能再拥有的时候，唯一可以做的就是令自己不要忘记
en: The  only  thing  you  can  do  when  you  no  longer  have  something  is  not  to  forget.

zh: 有一天那个人走进了你的生命，你就会明白，真爱总是值得等待的
en: One day that guy walks into you life and you will understand that true love is worth waiting

zh: 坏记性的好处在于可以多次如同第一次般的享受到同一个美好事物带来的欢乐。
en: The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time.

zh: 不知从什么时候开始，我变得连自己都感到陌生。
en: Do not know since when, I have become even oneself all feel strange.

zh: 在这个世界上，只有真正快乐的男人，才能带给女人真正的快乐
en: .In this world, only those men who really feel happy can give women happiness

zh: 虽然这是一项令人劳累的工作，但是我们觉得为世界各地的残疾朋友服务是无尚荣耀的事情
en: Though it was a tiring job, we felt it an honor to serve the disabled friends from all over the world.

zh: 全世界最勇猛的斗士是那些没有什么可以失去的人
en: RepostThe best fighters in the world are people with nothing to lose.

zh: 他并不是不爱你，只是没有按你想要的方式爱你。。。
en: It is not he does not love you.It is just not in the way you want.

zh: 有些人说眼见为实，但是眼睛也会欺骗你。重要的不是你看见了什么，而是你是否透过表象看到了真相。
en: Some people say seeing is believing, but what you see can also cheat you. What matters is not what you see, but whether you can see the truth behind the appearance.

zh: 世界这么大我们还是遇见了，世界这么小我们还是错过了。
en: The world is so big we meet, the world is so small that we missed.

zh: 未来是从今天开始的，不是明天
en: The future starts today, not tomorrow.

zh: 我只是需要一个可以说话的人
en: just need someone to talk to.

zh: 别人会忘记你说过的话，做过的事。但永远不会忘记你给他们的感觉
en: People will forget what you said. People will forget what you did. But people will never forget how you made them feel.

zh: 对一颗不快乐的心，一个无声的拥抱胜过千言万语
en: A silent hug means a thousand words to the unhappy heart.

zh: 纯浓的巧克力，就像初尝爱情的滋味那般美好。
en: strong chocolate, just like the taste of love to be the first tastes good.

zh: 我们不敢不是因为事情难，是因为我们不敢所以事情变难了
en: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.

zh: 无论过去发生过什么，无论你是否准备好了，下一刻都是一个崭新的开始
en: new stepNo matter what have happened and whether you are ready or not,every next moment is gonna be a brand new start.

zh: 与其用泪水悔恨昨天，不如用汗水拼搏今天
en: Better to struggle in sweat for today than to repent with tears for yesterday.

zh: 最后和你在一起的人，往往是你想不到的人
en: Finally,people with you,often you can not think of.

zh: 让一个人变强大的最好方式，就是拥有一个想要保护的人
en: The best way to make someone strong is to have someone who needs protection.

zh: 我觉得我就是一文盲
en: I think that i am an illiterate. .

zh: 改变心态只需一分钟，而这一分钟却能改变一整天。
en: one minute you can change your attitude and in that minute you can change your entire day.

zh: 太耀眼的城市不适合看星星，就象你的心不适合谈安定。
en: Too dazzling city is not suitable for seeing stars, like your heart is not suitable for talking to settle.

zh: 迷上一个人只需一分钟，喜欢上一个人需要一小时，爱上一个人则要一天，然而，忘记一个人却是一辈子的事情
en: It takes only a minute to get a crush on someone,an hour to like someone,and a day to love someone,but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.

zh: 享受生命中的小事情，因为有一天你回首往事，也许会发现它们其实是很重要的事情
en: exactlyEnjoy the small things in life ,for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.

zh: 在生活的键盘上，你总需要一只手指去按退出键。
en: On the keyboard of life always keep one finger on the escape key.

zh: 当我们第一次相见，我并没想到你对我如此重要。。
en: When we first met, I had no idea that you would be so important to me.

zh: 学会欣赏自己拥有什么，之前的时间逼着你欣赏你的
en: Learn to appreciate what you have, before time forces you to appreciate what you had.

zh: 在生活中，我们将遇到无法克服的困难。有时我们感到无助并陷入绝望的境地。在这种情况下，何去何从取决于我们是否拥有足够的勇于拼搏的精神
en: In life and work, we will meet with insurmountable difficulties. Occasionally we do feel helpless and fall in desperate situation. In this case, to be or not to be depends on whether we have enough courage to struggle.

zh: 我们应该珍惜我们永恒的友谊
en: We should cherish our everlasting friendship

zh: 微笑是改善容貌的一种并不昂贵的方式
en: That a smile is an inexpensive way to improve your looks.

zh: 喜欢一个人是宿命
en: liking someone is your fate

zh: 能发现自己的错误是智慧，能改正自己的错误是勇敢
en: Can find their own mistakes is wisdom, to correct its mistakes is brave

zh: 每个人都生活在各自过去中，我们用一分钟去认识一个人，用一小时去喜欢一个人，再用一天去爱上一个人，到最后，却用一辈子去忘记一个人
en: We all live in the past. We take a minute to know someone, one hour tolike someone, and one day to love someone, but the whole life to forget someone

zh: 谢谢你曾经来过，很遗憾你还是走开了。
en: Thanked you to come , was very regrettable you to get out of the way .

zh: 有时候，你给别人最简单的建议，却是自己最难做到的。
en: Sometimes, the simplest advice that you give to others is the hardest thing for you to follow.

zh: 我之所以懂得爱都是因为你。
en: If I know what love is, it is because of you.

zh: 青春，沿途再美的风景也只不过是一纸风华。
en: The youth, the scenery along the way again also is just a paper elegance.

zh: 我最需要的就是你需要我
en: I need is you needing me.

zh: 我只是一朵向日葵，等待着属于我的唯一的阳光
en: just a sunflower ,waiting for my only sunshine

zh: 越早把孩子当成大人，他就越早成为大人
en: The sooner you treat your son as as man, the sooner he will be one.

zh: 努力工作，保持开朗，让爱照料剩下的一切。
en: hard ,stay cheerful ,and let love take care of the rest .

zh: 那些能把你伤得最痛的人，通常都是你爱得最深的人。
en: Those who could hurt you the most are the ones that you love the most.

zh: 这个世界上最好的爱，就是让自己爱的人找到他的爱。
en: The best love in the world is to let someone you love find his love.

zh: 只有泪水洗过的眼睛，才有更开阔的视野
en: Only when our eyes have been washed by tears, can we have a broader field of vision

zh: 你最需要的是爱，爱是你一切所需。
en: All you need is love, love is all you need.

zh: 你不是一个天生的赢家，也不是一个天生的失败者，你只是你自己创造的你
en: You are not born a winner, nor a loser. You are what you make yourself be.

zh: 能在最不起眼的事情上找到快乐的人是最富有的人
en: That man is the richest whose pleasure are the cheapest.

zh: 生命必须有裂缝，阳光才照得进来。
en: Life has to have cracks in it so that the sun can shine through.

zh: 别试图在生命里勉强留住某人，如果他们要走，就放手。
en: try to force someone to stay in your life. If they want to go, let them go.

zh: 沉默是成长的标志，而成熟的标志，就是如何去沉默。
en: Silence is the sign of growth, while the sign of maturity is how to be silent.

zh: 找一件事做他一辈子找一个人爱她一辈子
en: Give your whole life to one man and one thing

zh: 不要让自己活得像个笑话。
en: Do not let yourself live like a joke.

zh: 没有比经久不衰的友谊更重要的东西，尤其是在这个不停变化的世界里。
en: There is nothing more important than friendships that endure, especially in a world that insists on changing.

zh: 一切都会好的，也许不是今天，但是最终都会好的
en: Everything is going to be alright, maybe not today, but eventually.

zh: 我在这部剧中最喜欢的场景总是与角色间的情感纠葛有关系
en: My favorite scenes in the show always have to do with emotional arcs within the characters.

zh: 我爱你，不是因为你是一个怎样的人，而是因为我喜欢与你在一起时的感觉。
en: RepostI love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.

zh: 每个人需要的仅仅是一点点爱，大大的希望和不可动摇的信念
en: Everybody needs just a little love, lots of hope and unshakable faith

zh: 你的过去不重要，重要的是你的未来
en: It is not where you come from that counts, it is where you are going..

zh: 当你积极地看待生活，并以此作为你的日常准则时，你就会找到快乐的真谛
en: You will find happiness when you adopt positive thinking into your daily routine and make it an important part of your world.

zh: 当你不得不向周围的人妥协，违背自己的意愿与道德，也许是时候换一批人走进你的世界了
en: When you have to start compromising yourself and your morals for the people around you, its probably time to change the people around you.

zh: 无论多么艰难，都要继续向前，因为只有你放弃的那一刻，你才输了
en: No matter how hard it is, just keep going because you only fail when you give up.

zh: 我不缅怀过去的历史，而致力于未来的梦想。
en: I like the dreams of the future than the history of the past.

zh: 距离并不可怕，可怕的是心越来越远
en: Distance is not terrible, terrible is farther and farther.

zh: 不过昨天多么糟糕，也不要让它影响到你的现在和将来。
en: matter how bad yesterday was, it should not impact the present and the future.

zh: 你不会知道自己有多坚强，直到除了坚强，你别无选择时。
en: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is the only choice you have.

zh: 真正的朋友会握着你的手，告诉你一切都会好起来的
en: forever friend holds your hand and tells you that everything is going to be okay.

zh: 我都要好好的对自己爱自己。好好对待自己，为了明天所给予的馈礼，而不是昨天所带走的印记
en: Treat yourself well. Live for what tomorrow has to offer, not for what yesterday took away.

zh: 有时候，我们不要想太多，顺着自己的心意就好了
en: you have to stop thinking too much and just go where your heart takes you

zh: 要实现梦想，最好先醒来。
en: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

zh: 生活的意义应该像种树，你并没有期望有一天能坐在树荫下享受它带来的阴凉
en: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.

zh: 从梦中醒来，梦想也许能成真。
en: Wake up from a dream, the dream might come true.

zh: 在某个不经意的瞬间，才发现，原来，我一直都只是一个人。
en: i have just one person.In a casual moment, only to find that, in fact, I have just one person.

zh: 面对危机怡然微笑的人，多半已经找到了替罪羊。
en: He who smiles in a crisis has found someone to blame.

zh: 你可怀疑任何人，但绝不要怀疑你自己
en: You may doubt others, but never yourself.

zh: 生活就是改变。有时痛苦，有时精彩。但大多数时候，两者兼有。
en: Life is change. Sometimes pain, sometimes wonderful. But most of the time, both.

zh: 决定我们成为什么样人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择
en: It is not our abilities that show us who we truly are, it is our choices.

zh: 对世界来说，你只是普通的一个人，但对某个人来说，你可能就是他的整个世界
en: To the world you are one person, but to one person you are the world.

zh: 朋友，就是我们自己选择的家人
en: Friends are the family we choose to have

zh: 你做出了这个决定，这是你的代价
en: You make the choice, and this is your price.

zh: 我想知道一生中有多少人，我看到了却从没有注意过
en: I wonder how many people Ive looked at all my life and never seen.

zh: 永远不说再见，我不想仅仅成为一段回忆。
en: Never say goodbye to love, because I dont want to be just a memory.

zh: 你只是我生命中一个小小的过客，你了解的仅仅是我的表面，你仅仅是我生命中的小小一部分。
en: You are merely a little part of my time in earth, a little understanding of my physical being. You have only, a little piece of me.

zh: 升级完成。开始新的篇章。非常期待余生盯着他妈的滚滚红尘发呆。
en: Upgrade completed. A new chapter begins. Looking forward to staring at the FUCKING red dirt for the rest of my life.

zh: 所谓成功，就是爱你自己，喜欢自己做的事，以及喜欢自己做事的方式
en: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

zh: 没人能够改变另一个人，但却能成为别人改变的一个原因。
en: No one can change a person,but someone can be a reason for that person to change.

zh: 早上醒来想到的第一个人和晚上睡觉前想到的最后一个人要么是你幸福的缘由，要么是你痛苦的根源。
en: It makes sense.The first person that you think of in the morning and the last person you think of at night is either the cause of your happiness or the cause of your pain.

zh: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从今日开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。
en: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.

zh: 很多人一开始为了梦想而忙，后来忙的忘了梦想。
en: Many people start a career with a dream, then get busy forgetting it.

zh: 除了你自己没有人知道你想要什么。
en: Except for you.Nobody knows what you want except for you.

zh: 我多想在你身边醒来。
en: I want to wake up where you are.

zh: 我觉得自己很蠢，而且这种蠢带有传染性
en: I feel stupid and contagious

zh: 摆在我们面前的困难并不是要阻挡我们，而是唤起我们的勇气和力量
en: Hard things are put in our way , not to stop us , but to call out our courage and strength.

zh: 想发现新大陆，就得做好很长时间看不到岸边的准备。
en: In order to discover new lands, one must be willing to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.

zh: 当有人离开你的生活时，随他们去吧。这只是给更好的人留足了进入你生活的空间
en: When someone walk out your life, let them. They are just making more room for someone else better to walk in.

zh: 当我站在人生最高处的时候，我觉得那是我觉得最美丽的时刻
en: The high challengeI have never in my life felt more beautiful than when I have stood my tallest.

zh: 生命的价值也许并不能用长度去衡量，而在于我们如何使用了这些时光，让自己回望来路无怨无悔。
en: The value of life lies not in the length of days, but in the use we make of them.

zh: 世界太大，生命这样短，要把它过得尽量像自己想要的那个样子。
en: The world is so big, and life is so short. We need to do as much as possible to live our lives the way we want to.

zh: 我们是一家人，手牵手一同步入黑暗，虽然我们可能信仰不同，但我相信这几句话能代表所有信仰的精神。
en: we are one family,stepping into the darkness together.We are a nation of many religions,but I believe these words reflect the spirit of all our faiths.

zh: 在这世上珍贵的东西总是罕有，所以这世上只有一个你。
en: things are very few in this world.That is the reason there is just one you.

zh: 其实好莱坞的电影套路都是一样的。
en: In fact the set patterns of Hollywood movies are all the same.

zh: 无论生活之路会遇到多少障碍，我都会竭尽所能地跑完这一程。
en: Regardless of what the obstacles may appear in my life, I will run my race, doing my best.

zh: 如果你想过得快乐，那就把生活和目标结合在一起，而不是来自他人或物质。
en: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal. Not to people or things.

zh: 这是我训练前拍得照片，我相信训练完就不会有这样的笑容了。
en: That picture was taken before training and I can only say that the smiles were gone by the time training was over.

zh: 要么没有，要么全部。要么现在，要么永不
en: All or nothing, now or never

zh: 从来没有人可以取代你。
en: Nobody could ever replace you...

zh: 伤心没有用，让自己好好地生活才最重要。爱情虽美，却不是生活的全部。
en: Sad useless, let oneself live your life is the most important. Love is beautiful, but is not the life complete.

zh: 义人得脱离患难，有恶人来代替他。
en: A righteous person is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked takes his place.

zh: 新政府的组成
en: formation of a new government

zh: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。朋友，是在最后可以给你力量的人。
en: Love is a lamp, while friendship is the shadow. When the lamp is off,you will find the shadow everywhere. Friend is who can give you strength at last.

zh: 我们说我们爱花朵，但是我们要采。说爱树木，但是我们要砍，我想这就是为什么那么多人在听到别人说爱自己的时候充满了恐惧。
en: We say we love flowers, yet we pluck them. We say we love trees, yet we cut them down. And people still wonder why some are afraid when told they are loved.

zh: 爱不在于彼此凝视，而在于注视着同一个方向。
en: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

zh: 在你让别人做事情之前，先设身处地为他们想想。
en: you put somebody in their place, put yourself in their place.

zh: 解释永远是多余的，因为懂你的人不需要它
en: Explanation is unnecessary, because people know you do not need it.

zh: 猫头鹰是唯一能看见蓝色的鸟
en: Owls are the only birds that can see the colour blue

zh: 经济萧条时期，有好几百万的失业者在街头游荡。
en: During the depression, millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.

zh: 临在的天性就是接受、允许和包容。如果你有评判，你就无法处在当下。理由很简单，因为在临在里是没有评判的
en: Presence, by its very nature accepts, allows, and includes. If you are involved in judgment, you cannot be present, for the simple reason that in Presence, there is no judgment.

zh: 无垠的沙漠热烈追求一叶绿草的爱，她摇摇头笑着飞开了。
en: The mighty desert is burning for the love of a blade of grass who  　　 shakes her head and laughs and flies away.

zh: 一份最新的研究报告称，随着气候变化，香蕉家族的作物将成为数百万人的主要食物来源。
en: Climate change could lead to crops from the banana family becoming a critical food source for millions of people, a new report says.

zh: 我对你有一点动心
en: I have a crush on you.

zh: 我应该努力做我自己。
en: I should try being myself.

en: The journey of life can get wearisome and bumpy at times, but good company can make the trip more pleasant. Extend the hand of friendship to your fellow travelers.

zh: 若要梦想实现，先从梦中醒来
en: If you want to make your dream come true, the first thing you have to do is to wake up.

zh: 如果没有你，我在哪里又有什么可惜。

zh: 你是选择体验快乐，还是选择创造快乐，我们只有两种选择。

en: Not everything is meant to be. But everything is worth a try.

en: You have everything and still the world holds no joy. Yet you make fun of those who would see it for its possibilities.

en: Do not walk behind me, for I may not lead. Do not walk ahead of me, for I may not follow. Do not walk beside me either. Just pretty much leave me the hell alone.

en: Time is the best medicine.I can feel you forgetting me.

zh: 我主张把进购鲜橙的数量控制在合理水平，以防止其随着时间的推移而霉变。
en: I advocate a properly limited quota of purchase of oranges lest it moulds as time goes on.

zh: 我就是我，由每条伤痕成就。
en: Every scar i have makes me who i am.

zh: 在邻舍面前击掌作保，乃是无知的人。
en: A man void of understanding strikes hands, and becomes collateral in the presence of his neighbor.

zh: 只有强者才能勇敢直面困难时刻，做出艰难抉择。而你正是这样一位强者。
en: It takes a strong person to deal with tough times and difficult choices. But you are a strong person.

zh: 很多事情不能自己掌控，即使再孤单再寂寞，仍要继续走下去。不许停也不能回头。
en: A lot of things can not control, even lonely again lonely still have to go. Not allowed to stop and not go back.

zh: 累了就睡觉，醒来就微笑。
en: Sleep when tired and smile when awake.

zh: 在任何时候，生活是困难还是简单完全取决于你如何调整自己，适应生活。
en: at any time can become difficult or easy. It all depends upon how one adjusts oneself to life.

zh: 对他人的成功一样欢欣鼓舞
en: be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own

zh: 这个碗与餐馆需要的食物无关。
en: This bowl is not being used to serve food where it is needed in the cafeteria.

zh: 不是没想过放弃，只是始终没有办法做到。
en: Not thought to give up, but always there is no way to do so.

zh: 有爱的地方就有痛
en: Where there is love there is pain.

zh: 我开车，你到后座去小睡一下。
en: Get in the back seat and take a nap while I drive.

zh: 只要我们有回忆，昨天就依然在。只要我们有希望，明天就在招手。只要我们心中有爱，今天就是美好的
en: As long as we have memories, yesterday remains. As long as we have hope, tomorrow waits. As long as we have love, today is beautiful.

zh: 我们将举行一个会议，会议时间表如下。
en: We will have a meeting scheduled as noted below...

zh: 清洁、高洁、初恋、自由、爽朗、永远快乐，你是我最可爱的波斯菊。
en: Clean, noble, love, freedom, hearty and happy forever, you are my lovely Cosmos.

zh: 我们永远支持你！我们当年的死党！加油！恩，我会一直等你，遇到谁也不会动心，心里只有你
en: i will always wait u

zh: 溺水胡抓草，病急乱投医。
en: A drowning man will catch at a straw.

zh: 当爱向你诉说时，请相信她，尽管她的声音可能打破你的梦想，就如同北风吹落花园里所有的花瓣
en: love speaks to you, believe in him, though his voice may shatter your dreams as the north wind lays waste the garden.

zh: 生活有时是令人沮丧的，但你可以努力的让自己的过得开心。
en: Life is sad at times, but it is up to you to make your own life happy.

zh: 爱，仅是文字，幸好有你，赋予定义。
en: Love is just a word, but you bring it definition.

zh: 快乐的旅伴犹如妙曲
en: A merry companion is a waggon in the way

zh: 爱情，要么让人成长，要么让人沉沦。
en: Love makes man grow up or sink down.

zh: 如果谁能把什么事都做好，我说让他去吧，给他一个机会
en: If there is anything that a man can do well ,I say let him do it .Give him a chance

zh: 好书正如良友，会让你受益终生。
en: good book is the best of friend, the same today and forever.

zh: 一些稀土的价格已在短短三周内增加一倍。目前中国大量囤积稀土令市场担心全球供应
en: Prices of some rare earth metals have doubled in just three weeks amid heavy stockpiling in China that has raised fears over global supplies.

zh: 亲爱的，我对你发脾气，是因为你对我来说更亲近。
en: Dear,I lose my temper at you it is because you are getting closer to me.

zh: 我们想为这批货物投保全损险。
en: We like to get a policy for total loss only for these goods.

zh: 时间能医治一切创伤。
en: Time heals all wounds.

zh: 人的善良或邪恶都存在于他自己的意志之中
en: The good or ill of man lies within his own will.

zh: 忒修斯之船
en: The ship of the Theseus.

zh: 幽长黑暗的隧道尽头必有希望之光
en: It is always light at the end of the tunnel.

zh: 能发现自己的错误是智慧，能改正自己的错误是勇敢。
en: Can find their own mistakes is wisdom, to correct its mistakes is brave
